dict.string:
Datatrans iOS SDK uses code from the following open source libraries:
- GData - card.io - OpenCV - Eigen - Code by Erica Sadun - Code by Georg Kitz - Lambda Alert - TLCommon - Openstack - KeyboardLayoutGuide
Licenses:
